about_the_game:
In Frostgrim’s Revenge, players are plunged into a remote, snow-covered village deep in a dense forest, long abandoned after a string of mysterious disappearances. Set on Christmas Eve, the village isn’t filled with festive cheer, but rather, an ancient and malevolent presence. A brutal blizzard traps players inside, while a supernatural snowman, Frostgrim, hunts anyone who dares to enter his frozen domain.

Players take on the role of a group of unfortunate travelers seeking shelter from the storm. Little do they know, the snowman they see is no ordinary decoration—it was created as part of a cursed Christmas ritual and now harbors the vengeful spirit of an ancient sorcerer. To survive, players must work together to break the curse by finding pages of Santa’s naughty list, hidden throughout the village, before they become Frostgrim's eternal victims.

Blending elements of survival horror and co-op mechanics, Frostgrim’s Revenge tests players ability to outlast both a deadly storm and a supernatural predator. The dynamic weather and environmental dangers require constant vigilance. Players must scavenge, stay warm, and work together to escape the village alive.

  • Team Size: 1–5 players

  • Shared Objectives: Players must gather Hidden Pages, manage their body heat, and evade Frostgrim.

  • Revive Mechanic: If a player is frozen or caught by Frostgrim, others can revive them by visiting the snowman cemetery.

Players must scour the village to find the hidden pages of Santa’s naughty list, using them to break Frostgrim’s curse and escape.

  • Frostgrim’s Patrol: Frostgrim stalks the village, using the cover of the storm to hide his movements. Players must seek shelter in abandoned buildings or near campfires to avoid detection.

  • Environment as a Weapon: Players cannot directly attack Frostgrim, but they can slow him down by luring him into fires.

  • Cold Mechanic: Players' cold meters deplete as they remain exposed to the blizzard. Keeping warm inside buildings or near heat sources is key to survival.

Frostgrim’s Revenge combines heart-pounding survival horror with eerie, atmospheric environments and cooperative gameplay. Players must band together to survive the supernatural wrath of an immortal snowman while navigating the dangers of an unforgiving winter storm. The unique warmth-sharing and stealth mechanics ensure that no two games are the same, keeping the tension high and the gameplay fresh.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD R9 270X
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD R5 1600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD RX 580
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Frostgrims Revenge is a co-op survival horror game set in a snow-covered village haunted by the snowman Frostgrim. Players must collaborate to collect Santa’s cursed naughty list while avoiding Frostgrim.
